name: Johnson, Appellant, v. J. H. Terry & Co. et al.
name_abbreviation: Johnson v. J. H. Terry & Co.

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
parties: Johnson, Appellant, v. J. H. Terry & Co. et al.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
This case is affirmed on the opinion of the Superior Court reported in 182 Pa. Superior Ct. 258, 126 A. 2d 798.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Edmund B. Spaeth, Jr., with him Frederick L. Fuges and MacGoy, Evans & Lewis, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Johnson, Appellant, v. J. H. Terry & Co. et al.

Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
June 28, 1957:
Alexander F. Barbieri, for appellant.
Edmund B. Spaeth, Jr., with him Frederick L. Fuges and MacGoy, Evans & Lewis, for appellees.
